name: PHASESpatialPipeline
desc: An object that specifies the volume of optional environmental effects.

items.name: init?(flags: PHASESpatialPipeline.Flags)
items.desc: Creates a spatial pipeline with the specified flags.

items.name: var flags: PHASESpatialPipeline.Flags
items.desc: A collection of environmental effects to include in the output.

items.name: var entries: [PHASESpatialCategory : PHASESpatialPipelineEntry]
items.desc: Audio layers for environmental effects to add to the output.

items.name: struct PHASESpatialPipeline.Flags
items.desc: Sound resonance options for a spatial pipeline.
